original_text: As a result of his faith, Moses left Egypt. He knew that the king would be angry, but Moses was not afraid of him. Instead, he continued strongly to trust God. Nobody can see God, but Moses lived like someone who could see God.
korean_text: 믿음으로 애굽을 떠나 왕의 노함을 무서워하지 아니하고 곧 보이지 아니하는 자를 보는 것 같이 하여 참았으며

sentences.original_text: As a result of his faith
He knew that the king would be angry
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 왕이 화를 낼 것이라는 것을 알았다

sentences.original_text: but Moses was not afraid of him
Instead, he continued strongly to trust God
sentences.korean_translation: 대신에, 그는 계속해서 하나님을 강하게 믿었다

sentences.original_text: but Moses lived like someone who could see God
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 모세는 하나님을 볼 수 있는 사람처럼 살았다
